alert.note: Alert for Eastern Plymouth; Southern Plymouth; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 4:36PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Plymouth County through 515 PM EDT... At 436 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Middleborough, or near Bridgewater, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Plymouth, Bridgewater, Middleborough, Wareham, East Bridgewater, Kingston, Carver, Hanson, Halifax and Plympton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Plymouth; Southern Plymouth; Western Plymouth
